en: The sun is shining. It is a very hot day.
zh: 太阳当空照着。天气非常炎热。

en: What a lovely, hot day!
zh: 真是个不错的大热天啊！

en: Peppa and George are wearing their boots!
zh: 佩奇和乔治穿着他们的靴子！

en: They are going to jump in muddy puddles!
I love muddy puddles.
Oh!
Oh, dear! The sun is so hot that the puddles have dried up!
zh: 哦，糟糕！天气太热了泥坑都晒干了！

en: Mummy! Daddy!
The puddles are all dry and we can't jump in them!
zh: 泥坑都晒干了，我们不能跳了！

en: Never mind, Peppa.
It's so sunny,you can play in the paddling pool instead!
zh: 天气晴朗，你们可以在充气泳池里玩！

en: Yes! The paddling pool!
First, you have to change into your swimming costumes.
zh: 首先，你得换上你的泳装。

en: Yes, Mummy.
Peppa and George are wearing their swimming costumes!
zh: 佩奇和乔治穿上了泳装！

en: Mummy Pig is wearing her swimming costume.
And Daddy Pig is wearing his swimming costume!
Because it's so hot, you need sun cream.
zh: 天气太热了，你要抹些防晒霜。

en: It's all oily and yucky!
Yuck!
What a fuss about nothing!
Yes, we all need sun cream today.
zh: 是啊，我们今天全都要抹防晒霜。

en: Oh!
Come on, George.
Let's get some air into this paddling pool!
Daddy Pig is pumping up the paddling pool!
zh: 爸爸在给充气泳池充气！

en: Easy as pie!
Peppa holds the hose and Mummy Pig turns on the water.
zh: 佩奇拿着水管妈妈打开了水笼头。

en: Where's the water?
Wahhh!
Peppa and George love their paddling pool.
zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢他们的充气泳池。

en: Ice cream! Ice cream!
Ms. Rabbit, the ice cream lady!
Ice cream!
On very hot days, Ms. Rabbit sells ice cream.
zh: 在天很热时，兔女士会卖冰淇淋。

en: Mummy, Daddy!
Can George and I have an ice cream, please?
zh: 乔治和我可以吃冰淇淋吗？

en: Oh, well, I suppose it is an especially hot day.
zh: 哦，好吧，今天实在太热了。

en: Hurray!
Please, can I have one as well?
Everyone likes ice cream!
Hello, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George.
zh: 你好，猪妈妈，佩奇和乔治。

en: Hello, Ms. Rabbit.
What ice creams would you like?
Can I have a cone, please, Ms. Rabbit?
zh: 可以给我一个冰淇淋球吗，兔女士？

en: Of course you may, Peppa!
Thank you.
The same for me and one for Daddy Pig, please.
zh: 我也要一样的冰淇淋球，猪爸爸也要一个。

en: And what would young Mr. George like?
Dine-Saw!
A dinosaur?
Silly George!
He always says ''dinosaur'' for everything!
zh: 他对什么东西都说“恐龙”！

en: Well, it just so happens that I do have a dinosaur shaped ice-lolly!
zh: 好吧，正巧我有卖恐龙形状的冰棍！

en: Dine-Saw!
George,you should eat your ice-lolly before it melts.
zh: 乔治，你应该在冰棍融化前快吃掉它。

en: Dine-Saw.
George loves his dinosaur ice-lolly so much, he doesn't want to eat it.
zh: 乔治太喜欢他的恐龙冰棍了，他不舍得吃了。

en: Thank you, Ms. Rabbit!
Enjoy the weather!
George, I really think you should eat your ice-lolly before it melts and falls on the ground.
zh: 乔治，我真的觉得你要快点吃你的冰棍不然它会融化掉到地上。

en: Oh, dear, George's dinosaur ice-lolly has melted and fallen on the ground.
zh: 哦，糟糕了，乔治的恐龙冰棍融化了并且掉到地上了。

en: Never mind, George.
You can share Daddy's ice cream.
zh: 你可以吃爸爸的冰淇淋。

en: I'm sure he won't mind.
It is so warm.
Daddy Pig has fallen asleep!
Daddy Pig does look hot!
Let's tip water on Daddy to cool him down!
zh: 让我们把水倒在爸爸身上让他凉快凉快！

en: Good idea, Peppa!
What happened?!!!
You were all red and hot, Daddy Pig!
zh: 你刚才又红又热的，猪爸爸！

en: So we tipped water on you!
Oh, I see. Thank you, Peppa.
zh: 哦，我明白了。谢谢你，佩奇。

en: Look! The puddles are back!
Quick, George, let's get out boots!
zh: 快，乔治，我们快去穿靴子！

en: Peppa and George are wearing their boots!
zh: 佩奇和乔治穿上了靴子！

en: Peppa and George love the hot day.
zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢大热天。

en: But most of all, they love jumping up and down in puddles!
zh: 但是最主要的是，他们喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！
